name: cybertruck
title: Cybertruck
text: The Tesla Cybertruck is a battery electric full-size pickup truck built by Tesla, Inc. since 2023.

name: model-s
title: Model S
text: The Tesla Model S is a battery electric full-size car with a liftback body style built by Tesla, Inc. since 2012.

name: model-x
title: Model X
text: The Tesla Model X is a battery electric mid-size luxury crossover SUV built by Tesla, Inc. since 2015.
